item.title: CVS polishes off deal to buy former Rite Aid stores, prescription files
item.description: CVS has finished buying customer prescription files from hundreds of closed Rite Aid drugstores and is now running 63 of the defunct chain’s locations

item.title: Federal workers endure financial strain, fear layoffs as government shutdown drags on
item.description: Federal workers furloughed or working without pay are feeling the financial squeeze and fear being swept up in the Trump administration's layoffs

item.title: Wall Street back to gains as focus turns from souring US-China relations to corporate earnings

item.title: OpenAI partners with Walmart to let users buy products in ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI is partnering with Walmart to allow shoppers to make purchases directly within ChatGPT, furthering the artificial intelligence company’s push t...

item.title: Ukrainian officials meet with US weapons manufacturers before Trump-Zelenskyy talks
item.description: A Ukrainian government delegation has met with major American weapons manufacturers during a U.S. visit
